a smile. 
"As you see," he said. 
"Indeed? Yes, yes!" said Boris, with a smile. "And we too have had a splendid march. You know, of course, that His Imperial Highness rode with our regiment all the time, so that we had every comfort and every advantage. What receptions we had in Poland! What dinners and balls! I can't tell you. And the Tsarvich was very gracious to all our officers." 
And the two friends told each other of their doings, the one of his hussar revels and life in the fighting l
